backend/main.mo: Backend actor handling access control, user approvals, profiles, and core match-related types with admin‑gated mutations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required visual-only Line stroke changes and connectNulls updates in ApaAggregateCharts.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files used for reference in build planning.
frontend/docs/v48-modecard-resume-button: Documentation of UI-only change moving Resume Game button below Start New Game in ModeCard.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router configuration with AuthGate, layout, route definitions, and global error fallback.
frontend/src/components/accepting-gifts/: Table component showing wins and losses by ball count for Accepting Gifts mode.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Interactive APA ball button rendering ball state with color-coded styles and accessibility labels.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball states, point values, and rack total calculations including one-away 9‑ball rule adjustments.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Rack scoring UI managing ball states, inning flow, auto-dead logic, and live/match completion updates.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final match results, player stats, and team match point outcomes.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Form for creating or editing APA match records with validation, saving, and connection handling.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Hook managing inning flow, active player turns, and shared inning counting.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate that handles login, access checks, invite-only rules, and renders children if authorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating or editing a user profile, handling backend readiness, validation, and save actions.
frontend/src/components/history/MatchHis: Renders a match history table with derived APA metrics, outcomes, and navigation to match details.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation controls, connection state indicators, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Provides a confirmation dialog and logic to delete a match and redirect or trigger a callback.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Reusable confirmation dialog for ending a match with configurable text and pending state.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Displays a summary card for a match, including mode, date, scores, and computed outcomes.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Card UI for selecting or resuming a game mode with navigation and session resume logic.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Renders APA performance trend charts by merging and sorting datapoints, showing multiple line charts with custom markers.
frontend/src/components/straight-shot/St: Builds a frequency histogram of shot counts and displays it using a bar chart.
Shows a summary table of straight-shot results including wins, losses, and first win date by ball count.
Displays shot trends over time with a composed bar and line chart and computes average shots.
frontend/src/dev/straight-shot-spot-chec: Manual QA checklist for verifying Straight Shot functionality after changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Provides a hook to clear and refetch the cached actor for reconnection attempts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, managing login, stored identity, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on matches and user profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Defines the 12-level Accepting Gifts progression and helpers for clamping, lookup, max attempts, and baseline updates.
Manages Accepting Gifts session state and updates scores or prepares new sets based on attempt results.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts cleaned APA match datapoints from practice and official matches, computing PPI/aPPI and related stats.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Maps APA skill levels to points-to-win values and provides validation and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Defines the APA 9-ball 20‑point conversion chart and thresholds based on loser skill level and points.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaPracticeMatchOut: Computes APA Practice match outcomes using loser SL/points and converts them to match‑point results.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Provides APA rack scoring, PPI calculation, validation, and aggregation of player rack statistics.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaSkillLevelPredic: Predicts APA skill levels using PPI or aPPI ranges against predefined lookup thresholds.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaExpected: Contains the official expected PPI table and utilities for bucketing win% and looking up expected PPI by SL.
Derives official APA win/loss/unknown outcomes based on skill levels and scores and exposes a helper that prefers a saved didWin flag when present.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Computes APA PPI and aPPI values and calculates win percentages and context‑aware aPPI using match history.
frontend/src/lib/history/matchHistoryRow: Builds short narrative result strings for match history across APA, Official APA, Accepting Gifts, and Straight Shot modes.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Parses official date strings and determines the effective match timestamp, preferring user-entered official dates when valid.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Builds Official APA match log records and auto-derives didWin based on skill levels and scores, re-exporting other builders.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Constructs APA practice and related match records, including outcome and player stats calculations.
frontend/src/lib/session/inProgressSessi: Provides helpers for checking, clearing, and listing in-progress sessionStorage states per game mode.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsPer: Computes wins and losses for Accepting Gifts matches grouped by starting ball count (2–7).
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsSta: Aggregates Accepting Gifts stats including total sessions and rolling average of ending ball counts.
Aggregates Official APA stats including win rate, average PPI, and average aPPI across all official matches.
frontend/src/lib/stats/straightShotStats: Computes straight-shot practice statistics including averages, trends, histogram data, and win-loss summaries from match records.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Runs the Accepting Gifts drill session, managing game state, progression, scoring, and match saving.
Displays the rules and structure of the Accepting Gifts drill.
Start page for the Accepting Gifts drill allowing player setup, level selection, and session creation or resume.
Manages the APA practice game flow, restoring and saving session state, tracking rack scoring, and handling match completion and saving.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Displays the setup form for starting an APA practice match, handling player names, skill levels, duplicate checks, and restoring in‑progress sessions.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Loads an existing official APA match and renders an editable form, redirecting if the match is missing.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Provides a form to manually create an official APA match log after the fact.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Shows an access‑denied message and allows users to request approval to use the app.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Displays detailed information for a single match, including APA‑specific stats and navigation to related views.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Shows the full match history with sorting, filtering by match type, and card or table view modes.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home screen with navigation cards for different game modes and optional match history link.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin page to view and manage user approvals and toggle invite-only mode with approve/reject actions.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Displays a player's APA aggregate stats, charts, win rate, and predicted skill levels with navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx: Provides a deployment verification page with basic navigation tests.
frontend/src/pages/stats/StatsPage.tsx: Shows the logged-in user's APA, Straight Shot, and Accepting Gifts stats with charts and navigation to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Handles active Straight Shot drill sessions, including session persistence, shot tracking, and saving match results.
Static panel describing rules and objectives of the Straight Shot drill.
Start page for new Straight Shot sessions with player input, moving average display, and resume/overwrite logic.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Utility to extract readable error messages from various error object formats.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Functions for normalizing and comparing player names case-insensitively.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds the route path for a player's aggregate stats page using URL encoding.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read URL and hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects with an error if the limit is exceeded.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state file describing build scope, gameplay architecture notes, and current known issues.
